Tool Call.article_content:
How to Reset Your Password

If you've forgotten your password, don't worry! Follow these simple steps to reset it:

1. Go to the login page and click 'Forgot Password'
2. Enter your registered email address
3. Check your email for a reset link
4. Click the link and create a new password
5. Make sure your new password is at least 8 characters long
6. Include both uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters
7. Save your new password in a secure location

If you don't receive the reset email within 10 minutes, check your spam folder. For additional help, contact our support team at support@company.com or call 1-800-555-0123.

Return Data.summary:
**Password Reset Steps:**

• Go to login page → click 'Forgot Password'
• Enter your registered email address
• Check email for reset link
• Click link and create new password (8+ characters)
• Use uppercase, lowercase, numbers & special characters

**Need Help?** Check spam folder if no email in 10 mins. Contact support@company.com or 1-800-555-0123
key_points: Include mixed case, numbers, and special characters
Contact support if email not received
